text: This reminds me of a quote, "If it's invisible, how will you know when you've found it?"
Haha, that's a good point. I suppose one could always call their phone to find it.
"Hey Siri, make my phone visible again" – Me, probably every 5 minutes.
I wonder how long it takes for someone to accidentally sit on their invisible phone and break it.
That's a valid concern. Maybe they could make an invisible case with a built-in airbag for protection.
I'd like to see the warranty claims for this: "I swear, I didn't see it before I sat down!"
The real question is, will it have an invisible price tag too?
I wouldn't count on it. If anything, I expect the price to be very visible and quite hefty.
